name: Lack of Space (skynix)
description:
Fight for resources in deserted space!

WASD movenment, LMB to choose target for attack and module managment (move cursor closer to your ship to view current ship configuration)

Currently game is at very early stage of development, so we are apologize for incomplete game experience and lack of introduction, be patient, please.

GitHub with To-Do list and test-branch of game project
